text: Fans have congratulated the winner of RuPaul ’ s Drag Race season 10 following a dramatic show finale. Going into Thursday ’ s crunch episode, four contestants – Asia O ’ Hara, Kameron Michaels, Eureka and Aquaria – were vying for the crown. Aquaria was eventually named the winner – but not before a tense lip - sync competition resulted in an embarrassing end for one of the queens. In the first challenge, the contestants were divided into pairs and made to battle each other in singles. Asia was faced with Kameron. Asia ’ s plan was to have live butterflies fly out – but they failed to release and the trick failed.
